divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the all day doppler radar for channel 9, when i saw in a movement of the radar a bright ball of light flash huge it was just above the K in Apopka on the match if you can rerun it, just as a lighnting strick hit in the same exact spot at the same time a bight red streak of light came out of the ball covering 3 counties, just north to Deland. Now if that wasn't strange enough the next time the radar past the red streak had turned green at 7:13 on the time. It is now 7:14 pm and the bright round light still has the streak but its red again and the ball has a red circular edge now. Commercial.......ok its back on and they've zoomed in on radar and its gone. I'll search online now, bye
Summary: bright white light in thunder storm with red beam shooting out on doppler
